summary: A man gets a colonoscopy. He wakes up in a hospital bed after a wrong operation. He's confused/scared and thinks back at talks at his 40th birthday party about hospital errors, scams etc.
cast: Tom Cavanagh|Kathleen York|Lawrence Hilton-Jacobs|Kat Coiro|David Clayton Rogers|Cas Anvar|Shanna Collins|Kyle Gallner|Bruce Nozick|Dan Gerrity|John Rubinstein|Paget Brewster|Jeffrey Anderson-Gunter|George Newbern|Jordi Caballero|Lilyan Chauvin|Michael Gregory|Carolyn Hennesy|Erik Jendresen|Michelle Page|Sujata Day|Susan Santiago
title: Sublime
